name: Amendola - Signature Series - Cannoli White
additionalNotes:
Amendola Signature Series Cannoli Cigars is manufactured at the La Zona factory in Esteli, Nicaragua the Original BP Red Cannoli (Mexican San Andres) is a decadent treat for the senses. The one that started it all, the boss of bosses, the original BP red cannoli is deep in rich flavors, full in body 
This little firecracker is wrapped in a potent dark Mexican San Andres wrapper with all Nicaraguan binder/fillers. The BP Red Cannoli delivers creamy, rich flavors with distinct chocolatey notes, earth, and graham cracker on the front end with nuances of dark roast coffee/espresso, nutmeg, barnyard and red pepper on the finish/retro. Full in flavor, full in body and full in strength.
